name: A New Beginning (lalalalalallalalala)
description: I am a 11 year old kid, I started learning ue4 2weeks ago by watching unreallive traingings, underscore , Mathew wadstein and virtus learning hub, I got busy in exams but saw about the jam on my moms phone 1 day before the submissions close on itch,so started working on a very little game with all my ue4 knowledge(probably ain't good), made this little game and now submitting, blew off school and missed a test, but i'm happy to participate in the jam, yeah, I probably learnt some new skills about spline meshes and spawning actors at random location.Thanks To virtus for this amazing game jam that lasted for 1 day! for me.
